snippet: As more Americans take up yoga, hotel companies, and even some airports, are beginning to cater to avid practitioners.
abstract: Hotel companies, and even some airports, are beginning to cater to avid yoga practitioners; number of Americans practicing yoga has risen 29 percent to 20.4 million since 2008.
lead_paragraph: As more Americans take up yoga, hotel companies, and even some airports, are beginning to cater to avid practitioners.

headline.seo: Some Hotel Companies and Airports Start to Offer Yoga
headline.main: A Moment of Zen, on the Go
headline.print_headline: A Moment of Zen, on the Go
